name: ILP#2-Jiawei-Peng
description:
How to play: 

Make a path for the green energy by moving and rotating the tube brick by left click or right click.

The more tube the energy walk through the more score you will get.

Yet, when the energy don't have a path to go, you will lose the game and all score you get this level.

TRY TO GET THE HIGHEST SCORE
